title: 이달의소녀탐구 #460 (LOONA TV #460)
summary:
0:01 -- HaSeul enters the waiting room. (Cho PD is back!!) Everyone is writing a message for Orbit who came to the show.
0:07 -- Kim Lip: "Each member should write 30 memos." She says that they wanted to do something special for Orbits so they proposed this idea to the director.
0:24 -- HeeJin shows Lippie's note where she drew herself and syas that people may not recognise that she drew it herself.
0:35 -- ViVi is preparing her memos and deciding a candy.
0:45 -- Rap time during the break. HaSeul and JinSoul do teh rap from Singing in The Rain.
0:50 -- Go Won does the same rap (with 70% air, 30% sound, and 100% swag).
0:56 -- Go Won does something that looks like a mic grab, but also a dab. (Without sound, it looks like she is just coughing or sneezing lel).
